title: zipline
text:
Wednesday September 26, 2012
  zipline
  
              
		
			    	
            
    	
		      
        
            
		
			    	
            
    	
		      
        
            
		
			    	
            
    	
		      
        
i have been stalking these shorts for a literal season now until they were drastically reduced on SSENSE. they are sorta perfect. baggy-check. white-check. leather-check. drawstring-check. how many more checks does a girl need?

            
		
			    	
            
    	
		      
        
i think my ratio of booty shorts to shorts my boyfriend can wear is starting to get a little disproportional. i’m not sure when it happened, but i just started buying everything larger and larger. these shorts are still a size zero but the baggy effect easily makes it look 2-3 sizes bigger than what i should wear. ie perfect.
            
		
			    	
            
    	
		      
        
            
		
			    	
            
    	
		      
        
i just can’t wait to wear this with something more substantial up top. like a nice sweater or an over-sized winter coat. dimensions mix mash extravaganza!
            
		
			    	
            
    	
		      
        
Â 3.1 Philip Lim Leather shorts (sold out but similar ones here, hereÂ )

Yesstyle Mens Mesh shirt (also worn in this post)

Lululemon Sports Bra
eBay leather hat

Zara bag
Zara boots (stop over at ASOS, their boots are all 20% off now!)
